name: Matthias Ott (@matthiasott@mastodon.social)
summary:
Somehow, @davatron5000’s blog was banned from Bing and DuckDuckGo.

He blogged about it.

It got solved. 🎉🤗

“Blog your problems. When in doubt, blog it out.
[…]
It truly is the Year of the Personal Website”
https://daverupert.com/2023/02/solved-the-case-of-the-bing-ban-theory/
